授業目的: The purpose of this lecture is to study about three topics in development economics: (i) economic development, (ii) the relationship between international trade and economic development, (iii) the relationship between foreign aid and economic development
到達目標:
(1) Students understand the key points for each topic.
(2) Students collect data relevant to each topic from databases compiled by World Bank, UNCTAD, and OECD.
(3) Students present their own opinions on a specific question for each topic.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回:
Introduction
・What do we learn about this course?
第2回:
Economic development①
・A disparity between rich and poor countries in terms of annual income
第3回:
Economic development②
・Developments beyond income: Human Development Index(HDI) and Sustainable Development Goals(SDGs)
第4回:
Economic development③
・How can we collect data on economic development using World Development Indicators?
第6回:
Economic development and international trade①
・What are characteristics of exports for developing countries?
第7回:
Economic development and international trade②
・Export promotion vs import substitution
第8回:
Economic development and international trade③
・How can we collect data on international trade using UNCTAD database?
第10回:
Economic development and foreign aid①
・What is Official Development Assistance(ODA)?
第11回:
Economic development and foreign aid②
・What are characteristics of AfT?
第12回:
Economic development and foreign aid③
・Is AfT effective?
第13回:
Economic development and foreign aid④
・How can we collect data on foreign aid using OECD database?
トピック.授業計画1: All lectures will be delivered in face-to-face format.

参考書/Reference books1: Michael P. Todaro, Stephen C. Smith
